sentences.en: DAB is the radio system of the 21st Century.
sentences.cn: 数字音频广播是21世纪的无线电广播系统。

sentences.en: Geometric designs were popular wall decorations in the 14th century.
sentences.cn: 14世纪，几何图形是风靡一时的墙壁装饰图案。

sentences.en: She worked at 20th Century Fox as a film editor.
sentences.cn: 她在20世纪福克斯公司担任电影剪辑师。

sentences.en: Some have called him the greatest entertainer of the twentieth century.
sentences.cn: 有人曾称他为20世纪最伟大的艺人。

sentences.en: The brooch dates back to the fourth century BC.
sentences.cn: 这枚胸针的历史可以追溯到公元前4世纪。

sentences.en: The feud with the Catholics goes back to the 11th century.
sentences.cn: 与天主教的夙怨可以追溯到11世纪。

sentences.en: The first British attempt to colonize Ireland was in the twelfth century.
sentences.cn: 英国最早尝试在爱尔兰开拓殖民地是在12世纪。

sentences.en: The fourteenth century cathedral was reduced to a mass of rubble.
sentences.cn: 这座14世纪的大教堂变成了一堆瓦砾。

sentences.en: The greatest polemicist of the 20th century must be Leon Trotsky.
sentences.cn: 20世纪最了不起的辩论家非列昂·托洛茨基莫属。

sentences.en: The interior of the shop still retains a nineteenth-century atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 这家商店的内部装修仍然保留着19世纪的风格。

sentences.en: The popular ceramics industry expanded towards the middle of the 19th century.
sentences.cn: 到19世纪中期，大众制陶业得到了发展。

sentences.en: the story of life on a small farm at the turn of the century
sentences.cn: 讲述世纪初一个小农场生活的故事

sentences.en: Their lives interconnect with those of celebrated figures of the late eighteenth-century.
sentences.cn: 他们的生活与18世纪晚期的名人联系在一起。

sentences.en: They fled to South America around the turn of the century.
sentences.cn: 他们在世纪之交逃到了南美洲。

sentences.en: This is early-20th-century rural Sussex, when horses still pulled the plough.
sentences.cn: 这是20世纪早期的萨塞克斯乡村，那时还是用马拉犁。

sentences.en: Why were spices so highly valued in late 15th-century Europe?
sentences.cn: 为什么香料在15世纪末期的欧洲如此贵重？

phrases.tran_cn: 世纪酒店（电影名称，酒店名称）
世纪之交；19世纪与20世纪转换交替时期；19世纪末20世纪初

trans.tran_en: one of the 100-year periods measured from before or after the year of Christ’s birth
